TEXT.TITLE: FLUOR <FLR> GETS 197.6 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Fluor Constructors Inc, which is owned by Fluor Corp, has received a 197.6 mln dlr contract for work on facilities which will be used in ground-based free electron laser technology, the Defense Department said. REUTER
